summary: A test suite that validates the behavior of a generic inline model admin component in a web framework, checking how it handles form field exclusions, readonly configurations, fieldset generation, formset parameters, and the structure of returned inline formsets.
business_intent: To guarantee that the generic inline admin correctly processes custom form metadata, respects readâ€‘only settings, assembles fieldsets, passes appropriate arguments to formsets, and returns expected inline formset tuples, thereby ensuring stable admin functionality.
